testCase.requirementText: The transferred content is placed in the file section in different file group elements, described in other requirements. Only a single file section (<fileSec>) element should be present. It is possible to transfer just descriptive metadata and/or administrative metadata without files placed in this section.
testCase.description: Data issues, that is missing files on the file system or files with no METS reference are an integrity issue.

rule.description: The package METS document SHOULD contain a single mets/filesec element only

error.message: An information package METS document should contain a single mets/filesec only.

package.name: no_file_sec
package.description: The package root METS document has no mets/filesec element.
